mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PAY_BATCH_CHECKPATH (PAYDATE, PAYSERNO, PAYTIME, MSGID, SENDERDATETIME, INSTGDRCTPTY, INSTDDRCTPTY, REMARK, DIGITALENVELOPE, BATCHDATE, BATCHID, COUNTNUM, COUNTAMT, CCY, DBITCOUNTNUM, DBITCOUNTAMT, CRDTCOUNTNUM, CRDTCOUNTAMT, MSGTYPE, MSGBIZSTATUS, MSGCOUNTNUM, MSGCOUNTAMT, MSGDBITCOUNTNUM, MSGDBITCOUNTAMT, MSGCRDTCOUNTNUM, MSGCRDTCOUNTAMT, CHECKSTATUS, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME) VALUES(#{payDate}, #{paySerno}, #{payTime}, #{msgId}, #{senderDateTime}, #{instgDrctPty}, #{instdDrctPty}, #{remark}, #{digitalEnvelope}, #{batchDate}, #{batchId}, #{countNum}, #{countAmt}, #{ccy}, #{dBITCountNum}, #{dBITCountAmt}, #{cRDTCountNum}, #{cRDTCountAmt}, #{msgType}, #{msgBizStatus}, #{msgCountNum}, #{msgCountAmt}, #{msgDBITCountNum}, #{msgDBITCountAmt}, #{msgCRDTCountNum}, #{msgCRDTCountAmt}, #{checkStatus}, #{lastUpDate}, #{lastUpTime})

INSERT INTO PAY_BATCH_CHECKPATH (PAYDATE, PAYSERNO, PAYTIME, MSGID, SENDERDATETIME, INSTGDRCTPTY, INSTDDRCTPTY, REMARK, DIGITALENVELOPE, BATCHDATE, BATCHID, COUNTNUM, COUNTAMT, CCY, DBITCOUNTNUM, DBITCOUNTAMT, CRDTCOUNTNUM, CRDTCOUNTAMT, MSGTYPE, MSGBIZSTATUS, MSGCOUNTNUM, MSGCOUNTAMT, MSGDBITCOUNTNUM, MSGDBITCOUNTAMT, MSGCRDTCOUNTNUM, MSGCRDTCOUNTAMT, CHECKSTATUS, LASTUPDATE, LASTUPTIME) VALUE
(#{item.payDate}, #{item.paySerno}, #{item.payTime}, #{item.msgId}, #{item.senderDateTime}, #{item.instgDrctPty}, #{item.instdDrctPty}, #{item.remark}, #{item.digitalEnvelope}, #{item.batchDate}, #{item.batchId}, #{item.countNum}, #{item.countAmt}, #{item.ccy}, #{item.dBITCountNum}, #{item.dBITCountAmt}, #{item.cRDTCountNum}, #{item.cRDTCountAmt}, #{item.msgType}, #{item.msgBizStatus}, #{item.msgCountNum}, #{item.msgCountAmt}, #{item.msgDBITCountNum}, #{item.msgDBITCountAmt}, #{item.msgCRDTCountNum}, #{item.msgCRDTCountAmt}, #{item.checkStatus}, #{item.lastUpDate}, #{item.lastUpTime})
mapper.select: SELECT t.PAYDATE payDate, t.PAYSERNO paySerno, t.PAYTIME payTime , t.MSGID msgId, t.SENDERDATETIME senderDateTime, t.INSTGDRCTPTY instgDrctPty, t.INSTDDRCTPTY instdDrctPty, t.REMARK remark, t.DIGITALENVELOPE digitalEnvelope, t.BATCHDATE batchDate, t.BATCHID batchId, t.COUNTNUM countNum, t.COUNTAMT countAmt, t.CCY ccy, t.DBITCOUNTNUM dBITCountNum, t.DBITCOUNTAMT dBITCountAmt, t.CRDTCOUNTNUM cRDTCountNum, t.CRDTCOUNTAMT cRDTCountAmt, t.MSGTYPE msgType, t.MSGBIZSTATUS msgBizStatus, t.MSGCOUNTNUM msgCountNum, t.MSGCOUNTAMT msgCountAmt, t.MSGDBITCOUNTNUM msgDBITCountNum, t.MSGDBITCOUNTAMT msgDBITCountAmt, t.MSGCRDTCOUNTNUM msgCRDTCountNum, t.MSGCRDTCOUNTAMT msgCRDTCountAmt, t.CHECKSTATUS checkStatus, t.LASTUPDATE lastUpDate, t.LASTUPTIME lastUpTime FROM PAY_BATCH_CHECKPATH t where t.BATCHDATE = #{batchDate} AND t.BATCHID = #{batchId}

SELECT t.PAYDATE payDate, t.PAYSERNO paySerno, t.PAYTIME payTime , t.MSGID msgId, t.SENDERDATETIME senderDateTime, t.INSTGDRCTPTY instgDrctPty, t.INSTDDRCTPTY instdDrctPty, t.REMARK remark, t.DIGITALENVELOPE digitalEnvelope, t.BATCHDATE batchDate, t.BATCHID batchId, t.COUNTNUM countNum, t.COUNTAMT countAmt, t.CCY ccy, t.DBITCOUNTNUM dBITCountNum, t.DBITCOUNTAMT dBITCountAmt, t.CRDTCOUNTNUM cRDTCountNum, t.CRDTCOUNTAMT cRDTCountAmt, d.MSGTYPE msgType, d.MSGBIZSTATUS msgBizStatus, d.MSGCOUNTNUM msgCountNum, d.MSGCOUNTAMT msgCountAmt, d.MSGDBITCOUNTNUM msgDBITCountNum, d.MSGDBITCOUNTAMT msgDBITCountAmt, d.MSGCRDTCOUNTNUM msgCRDTCountNum, d.MSGCRDTCOUNTAMT msgCRDTCountAmt, 'INIT' checkStatus FROM PAY_ONLINE_CHECKPATH_MAIN t, (select S.MSGID, S.BATCHDATE, S.BATCHID, S.MSGTYPE, case when s.MSGBIZSTATUS in ('PR00', 'PR03') then 'PR00' when s.MSGBIZSTATUS in ('PR01', 'PR04') then 'PR01' else 'PR02' end MSGBIZSTATUS, sum(convert(s.MSGCOUNTNUM, DECIMAL)) MSGCOUNTNUM, sum(convert(s.MSGCOUNTAMT, DECIMAL)) MSGCOUNTAMT, sum(convert(s.MSGDBITCOUNTNUM, DECIMAL)) MSGDBITCOUNTNUM, sum(convert(s.MSGDBITCOUNTAMT, DECIMAL)) MSGDBITCOUNTAMT, sum(convert(s.MSGCRDTCOUNTNUM, DECIMAL)) MSGCRDTCOUNTNUM, sum(convert(s.MSGCRDTCOUNTAMT, DECIMAL)) MSGCRDTCOUNTAMT from PAY_ONLINE_CHECKPATH_SUB s where s.BATCHDATE = #{batchDate} and s.BATCHID = #{batchId} group by S.MSGID, S.BATCHDATE, S.BATCHID, S.MSGTYPE, case when s.MSGBIZSTATUS in ('PR00', 'PR03') then 'PR00' when s.MSGBIZSTATUS in ('PR01', 'PR04') then 'PR01' else 'PR02' end) d where t.MSGID = d.MSGID AND t.BATCHID = d.BATCHID AND t.BATCHDATE = #{batchDate} AND t.BATCHID = #{batchId}
